Joy-Driven Development is related to, but not synonymous with the ever-growing concept of "developer experience" ‚Äì not all DX is joy-driven! And not all joy comes from DX! But often joy-driven development means choosing tools that make building both fun and frictionless

Joy-Driven Development can (and should!) serve as the compass through which your team makes decisions. The goal is not to avoid hard problems, but to make solving hard problems *fun*, and create a better experience both for the team and the end user.  

https://t.co/MbReV2ZQ8p

I have another post about How To Run A Project (https://t.co/CgdwPgev2m) that talks about the concept of Good Vibes more broadly, but Joy-Driven Development is closer to the core of the decision making of a project and is worth expanding on further https://t.co/N9jhoPVn5Y
I finally took some time to write up a philosophy that has been guiding my work for the past few years: Joy-Driven Development https://t.co/3y4Zz846vM
My intuition says that peering into robot brains should look something between these two images, and I really want to build it for a worthwhile dataset https://t.co/mHVTAtGaHr

If you have a dataset of embeddings that you want to understand deeper through visualization, network analysis, clustering, or labeling, get in touch. Looking to build more in this space over the summer. ejfox@ejfox.com

@i_m_m @schwanksta I would suggest taking a look at some of the tweets on my time line from people smarter than me explaining the ways in which it worries them. Downplaying this event really scares me, personally and professionally, even if you cannot see it yourself this morning.

@i_m_m @schwanksta This reads like an indictment designed to scare journalists away from reporting on hacked information, especially after reading the specific logs they are referring to. It worries me because I have had multiple acquaintances imprisoned for matters closely related to these issues.
@i_m_m @schwanksta So it doesn't worry you?

RT @kpoulsen: Here's Julian Assange's fateful offer to crack a password for Chelsea Manning.

Context: Manning, worried her SIPRnet downloa‚Ä¶

@i_m_m @schwanksta Including this statement as if it is incitement doesn‚Äôt worry you, as a journalist? Seems like a very strange moment to be downplaying assaults on press freedom. https://t.co/IqB9G7PSxo
